mapper.select: SELECT s.student_id as studentId, s.full_name as fullName, s.dob, s.gender, s.email, c.course_name as courseName, s.status FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY s.student_id LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into students(student_id, full_name, dob, gender,email, course_id, status,username) values(#{studentId},#{fullName},#{dob},#{gender},#{email},#{courseId},#{status},#{username})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET full_name = #{fullName}, dob = #{dob}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email}, course_id = #{courseId}, status = #{status} WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.select: select stu.student_id as studentId, stu.full_name as fullName , stu.dob ,stu.gender , stu.email ,c.course_id as courseId ,stu.status from students stu join courses c on c.course_id = stu.course_id where student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT s.student_id AS studentId, s.full_name AS fullName, s.dob, s.gender, s.email, s.course_id AS courseId, s.status, c.course_name AS courseName, u.username AS username FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN users u ON s.email = u.email ORDER BY s.student_id

SELECT sc.student_username AS username, u.full_name AS fullName FROM student_class sc JOIN teacher_class tc ON sc.class_id = tc.class_id JOIN users u ON sc.student_username = u.username WHERE tc.username = #{teacherUsername}
